sample_preparation.purification_details: first exchange to MNG

Loaded on NHS-activated sepharose coupled to anti-GFP antibody, washed with 20 CV containing 0.05% DDM, 0.005% CHS, then incubated with protease (10:1 w/w) for 16 h, 4 C. Eluent was run through anti-GST column to remove protease, concentrated and run on SEC (S200).  Peak concentrated for grid preparation.

Loaded on Rho-ID4 antibody sepharose, incubated 3-18 h.  Washed with 40 CV and then eluted with 3 CV of  1:10 w/w 3C or 0.5 mg/mL ID4 peptide for 2-18 h.  The 3C protease was His tagged and remocved by Ni-NTA.  This was then mixed with 2-3x excess of  substrate (UIC2-Fab) and then mixed with 1:10 w/w amphipol for 4 h, 4 C before detergent removal by beads ON.  Sample was then concentrated for grids.

Loaded on anti-Flag M2, washed with 0.06% digitonin and eluted with Flag peptide.  Eluent then applied to Ni-NTA, washed with 20 mM imidazole and eluted with 250 mM.  Eluent concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Fractions pooled and concentrated.

Solubilization incubated with talon beads for 90 min, 4 C with 10 mM imidazole before column loading and 3 CV wash with 10 mM imidazole and 1 mM DDM.  Protein was then eluted with 250 mM imidazole  and the eGFP was cleavced by thrombin digestion.  Sample was then injected on SEC (? column) and peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

Solubilized protein was incubated with inhibitor (bovI1-60-His-10) and loaded on Ni-NTA and eluted with imidazole gradient from 25-250 mM (elution at ~150 mM) in buffer containing 0.05% DDM.  Eluent was then applied to SEC (S6) containing 0.05% CYMAL-7 and purified protein used for grid preparation (unclear if concentrated post-SEC).
Digitonin+OGNG also involved

Solubilized, applied to His-Trap Ni-NTA column, washed with 0.03% DDM (10 CV), eluted witha a 20 CV gradient up to 500 mM imidazole.  Eluent then diluted 5x and applied to 1 mL His-Trap Ni-NTA where it was eluted with a 30 CV gradient up to 500 mM.  Pooled eluent was then concentrated and applied to SEC (S6).

sample_preparation.affinity_tag_terminus: FLAG (N, PEN-2), HA (C, APH-1), V5-6His (C, Nicastrin)
sample_preparation.purification_details: Exchanged on anti-Flag gel, washed/eluted with 0.1% digitonin.  Then concentrated and run through Superose 6 column, pooled and concentrated then incubated with amphipol A8-35 for 4 hours @ 4 C

sample_preparation.affinity_tag_terminus: FLAG (N, PEN-2), HA (C, APH-1), V5-6His (C, Nicastrin)
sample_preparation.purification_details: Exchanged on anti-Flag gel, washed/eluted with 0.1% digitonin.  Then concentrated and run through Superose 6 column, pooled and concentrated then incubated with amphipol A8-35 for 4 hours @ 4 C

sample_preparation.affinity_tag_terminus: FLAG (N, PEN-2), HA (C, APH-1), V5-6His (C, Nicastrin)
sample_preparation.purification_details: Exchanged on anti-Flag gel, washed/eluted with 0.1% digitonin.  Then concentrated and run through Superose 6 column, pooled and concentrated  for use in grid preparation.

80S ribosomes were removed from rabbit reticulocyte lysate by centrifugation.  Supernatant was then used in 3.5 mL translation reaction swith pancreatic microsomes (A280 ~ 12).  Incubation for 5 min, 32 C, Hbs1-DN added to 133 nmM and incubated for 20 min, 32C.  Membranes then solubilizaed, diluted 10x  and incubated with anti-FLAG resin for 2 h, 4 C.  Sample then washed with 100 CV in a spin column and eluted with 1 CV containing 0.2 mg/mL 3X FLAG peptide and used immediately for grid preparation.

Bound protein was washed with lower stablizer concentrations then incubated with protease ON at 4 C (10:1 ratio).  Eluant was then concentrated and run on SEC (S6).  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grids.

grid_preparation.comments: <3 nm amorphous carbon layer added, 2 D crystals

sample_preparation.purification_details: Sample bound to talon was washed with 40 mM imidazole and eluted with 500 mM.  Substrate (cAMP) was present in 0.2 mM throughout purification.  Eluent was then mixed with E coli PL at a lipid:protein 0.8:1 (w/w) and dialysed against detergent free buffer. This resulted in lipid embedded 2-D crystals used for cryo ED.

Frozen membrane pellets thawed, solubilized, and incubated with Talon resin (10:1 v:v talon) for 2 h, 4 C with 8 mM imidazole.  Washed with 20 mM and eluted with 250 mM and immediately desalted (PD-10 column).  Concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  suppplemented with 1 mM cAMP at each step after thawing.
Eluted with FLAG peptide, concentrated and run on SEC (S6)

Incubated with streptavidin affinity resin for 90 min, washed with buffer containing 0.12% digitonin and eluted with 4 mM biotin.  Eluent was then deglycosylated by incubation for 2 h, 4 C with PNGaseF and subsequently concentrated, loaded on SEC (S200).  Peak was then pooled anc concentrated for use in grid preparation.

Bound protein was washed with 60 CV of 0.12% digitonin and eluted with 3 mM biotin.  Protein was then deglycosylated for 2 h with PNGaseF, concentrated and applied to SEC (S6).  Fractions pooled and concentrated.

Sample was flowed through talon resin to remove free GFP and loaded on StrepTactin column.  Washed with 0.1% digitonin and eluted with 5 mM biotin.  Eluent was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Fractions pooled and concentrated before incubation with 2 mM EDTA, 20 uM glibenclamide for 2 h and finally grid preparation.
GFP nanobody resin incubated for 1 h, washed and incubated with protease ON with rotation.  Eluent was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6) then concentrated
GFP nanobody resin incubated for 1 h, washed and incubated with protease ON with rotation.  Eluent was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6) then concentrated

Run on FLAG, washed with 4 CV of 0.06% GDN, 0.001% SDS then eluted with flag peptide.  applied to StrepTactin, again washed with 4 CV of GDN, SDS and eluted with biotin.  Eluent incubated at 4 C ON with 0.12% GDN, concentrated and run on SEC (S6).

Bound and washed on anti-FLAG column, eluted with FLAG peptide and loaded on StrepTactin gravity column.  Eluted with biotin, concentrated and injected on SEC (S6).  Peak fractions pooled and concentrated for grids.

grid_preparation.comments: Incubated with substrate (1 mM EDTA or 1 mM ADPR, 1 mM CaCl2)

sample_preparation.purification_details: Incubated with Talon resin for 2 h, washed with 6 CV 10 mM imidazole and eluted with 250 mM.  Peak concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6) with peak again pooled and concentrated for grid preperation.

name: No mechanoreceptor potential C isoform L

sample_preparation.purification_details: Immobilized on anti-GFP nanobody coupled resin ON before washing with 10 CCV of buffer with DDM, CHS and lipids (0.05%, 0.01%, 0.1 mg/mL 3:1:1 POPC:POPE:POPG).  this was then incubated ON, 4 C with 0.2 mg protease.  Eluent was then incubated with MSP (MSP2N2) and lipids (soy PC) with constant rotation for 4 days in a molar ratio of 1:4:100 protein:MSP:lipid, each day after the initial with SM2 beads being added (3:100 v/v).  Sample was cleared through a minicolumn and then injected on SEC (S6).  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

Incubated with anti-FLAG M2 resin for 30-40 min, 4 C before washing with 10 CV containing 0.06-0.1% digitonin and elution with 0.1 mg/mL FLAG peptide.  Eluent was concentrated and run on SEC (S6) with peak being pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

Bound to GFP nanobody resin, washed with 0.1% DDM, 0.02% CHS, 0.1 mg/mL lipids (5:5:1 POPE:POPC:POPA) and eluted with protease (time, temp unreported).  Eluent was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6) with peak poooled, concentrated and immediately used for grid preparation.

Injected onto GFP nanobody coupled sepharose, washed with 10 CV containing 0.05% digitonin.  This was then incubated ON, 4 C with protease (40:1 w/w ratio) following by elution with wash buffer.  Eluent was thenc concentrated and applied to SEC (S6) with peak pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.
Incubated for 2 h, 4 C with anti GFP beads, washed and then incubated with TEV ON.  Elution was concentrated and run on SEC (S6)

Eluted from amylose resin with 20 mM maltose in 0.5 mM DDM, concentrated to 2-3 mg/mL, then incubated with MSP2N2 and soy PL in a 1:1:200 molar ratio on ice for 30 min.  Beads were then added to this in 4 aliquots (30 mg/mL each time) at 1 h intervals, done at 4 C with gentle rotation.  TEV protease was then added with final batch of beads and sample was incubated ON at 4 C.  Mixture was centrifuged and loaded on SEC (S6).  Peak was pooled for grid preparation.
Exchanged after elution by incubation with amphipols

grid_preparation.comments: Incubated with substrate (ATP, metals) at RT for 3 hrs, filtered before application to grids

sample_preparation.purification_details: Protein eluted by ON incubation with PreScission protease after wash with 0.1% digitonin and 0.01% lipids (3:1:1 POPC:POPE:POPG).  Incubated ON with amphipols and detergent removed by 10 fold dilution followed by concentration

Bound to anti-GFP nanobody column and washed with DDM, CHS, Lipid containing buffer (0.05%, 0.01%, 0.1 mg/mL 3:1:1 POPC:POPE:POPS).  Elution performed ON, 4 C with 50 mg protease.  Eluent was then mixed with MSP2N2 and soy PC in a ratio of 1:4:100 protein:MSP:lipid (molar).  Mixture incubated for 1 h before the first of 3 aliquots of SM2 beads were added over 24 h.  Sample was then fdiltered through a 0.45 um filter and loaded on SEC (S200).  Peak was then pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.
Imobilized on GFP nanobody colun and incubated with protease ON, 4 C.  Eluent was then run on SEC (S6) and peak was pooled and concentrated for immediate grid preparation.

First the sample was incubated with with a GST-fused protein (scFcv735) for which it has an affinity.  This was then loaded on a glutathione column (GS4B) and incubated for 1 h, 4 C.  Protein was washed with 500 mM NaCl and eluted with 3 M NaCl.  Eluent was then loaded on SEC (S200) and peak fractions pooled for grid preparation.

grid_preparation.details: copper grids on thin continuous carbon (30 A thick), 2 s blot time

sample_preparation.purification_details: Tag cut in affinity column (no details given) followed by SEC (S200)

grid_preparation.comments: Mixed with substrate (18 mM pregabalin) for 30 min on ice before application

sample_preparation.purification_details: Eluted from affinity column and directly concentrated for grids.

grid_preparation.comments: C-flat grids were coated with 5 nm Au in house

sample_preparation.purification_details: Incubated on anit-Flag resin for 4-5 h, washed with 5 CV containing 0.05% digitonin and eluted with Flag peptide.  Eluent was concentrated and subjected to SEC (S6).
Incubated on anit-Flag resin for 4-5 h, washed with 5 CV containing 0.05% digitonin and eluted with Flag peptide.  Eluent was concentrated and subjected to SEC (S6).

Incubated with Talon ON, washed with 10-20 CV 30 mM imidazole, 0.1 mg/mL lipids (3:1:1 POPC:POPG:POPE) and eluted with 300 mM imidazole.  This was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200) befoee reconstitution into nanodiscs (3 uM:30 uM:12uM protein:MSP:Lipid) by incubation with beads (30x detergentr wt) for 2-3 hrs.  Mixture was filtered and appled to SEC (S200).
0.1 mg/ml POPC/POPE/POPG (3:1:1 )

Incubated with Ni-NTA beads with 20 mM imidazole for 7.5 h, 4 C then washed with 0.1% DDM, 0.1 mM CHS, 0.03 mg/mL Soy PL before elution by incubation with thrombin ON, 4 C.  Eluent loaded on SEC (S6) and peak pooled and concentrated for reconstitution.  Reconstitution performed with protein, MSPE3D1, and mixed detergent lipid micelles (10 mM Soy PL, 1 mM CHS, 30 mM DDM) mixed ina 2:10:1000 ratio, incubated for 1 h, 4 C.  400-500 mg SM2 biobeads were then added and reaction shaken ON, 4 C.  Nanodiscs were then concentrated and frozen in 5% sucrose by LN2 and stored at -80 C for grid preparation.

Incubated with 1D4 affinity resin for 5 h, 4 C before 10 washes contianing 4 mM DDM, 0.1 mg/mL lipids (3:1 POPE:POPG).  Protein digested with protease (20:1 w/w) ON, 4 C.  Eluted with 2 CV wash buffer.  Eluent then concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Fractions pooled and concentrated for grid preperation

Incubated with 1D4 affinity resin for 5 h, 4 C before 10 washes contianing 4 mM DDM, 0.1 mg/mL lipids (3:1 POPE:POPG).  Protein digested with protease (20:1 w/w) ON, 4 C.  Eluent then concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Fractions pooled and concentrated for grid preperation

name: TRPV6 transient receptor potential calcium channel

sample_preparation.purification_details: StrepTactin then SEC (S6) followed by incubation with A8-35 for 3h with rotation at 4C.  Beads added at 15 mg/mL and rotated for 20h at 4 C

Incubated with talon resin for 1 h, 4 C then washed with 15 CV buffer containing 0.01% DDM, 30 mM imidazole followed by 15 CCV with 0.035% UDM before elution at 400 mM imidazole.  Eluent then desalted (PD-10), treated with 0.4 U alpha-L-fucosidase ON, 18 C and subsequently a 0.75:0.5:1 TEV:PNGase F:protein w/w/w for 24 h, 18 C.  Flowthrough eluent was then concentrated and run on SEC (S6).  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.
Exchanged after elution by incubation with amphipols ON at 4C with gentle agitation. LMNG removed with beads, 8 h.  Then incubated with TEV ON at 4 C

antiFLAG column eluted with lipids (3:1:1 POPC:POPE:POPG), then SEC (S6) and incubated with PMAL-C8 ON at 4C with gentle agitation.  detergent removed with 15mg/mL beads for 1h at 4C and then run on S6 column

Loaded on anti-GFP coupled CNBr sepharose 4B resin and mixed by inversion for 2 h.  Washed with 10 CV in batch and 10 CV in column containing 0.2% DDM, 0.04% CHS.  Protein then digested with protease ON (20:1 w/w).  Eluent was then pooled, concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6) with 0.025% DDM, 0.005% CHS.  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation

Mixed by inversion for 2 h, 4 Cwith anti-GFP resin, washed with 10 CV containing 0.2% DDM, 0.04% CHS before ON, 4 Crocking with 20:1 w/w ratio of protease.  Flowthrough eluent was then concentrated and run on SEC (S6) with peak being pooled and concentrated for grid preparation,.
ON incubation w/ amphipols at 4C, Biobeads for 8 H, TEV ON at 4C

Loaded on ion exchange (? column) and elutede at 250 mM NaCl.  Fractions pooled, concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200) and fractions with a high A1008/A280 (>1.22) were pooled and used for grid preparation.

Eluted off anion exchange (Q-sepharose) with 200 mM NaCl, solubilized a second time (0.5% DDM, 30 min, on ice) and loaded on 0.2-1.0 M continuous sucrose gradient.  Green band was then precipitated with PEG1450 and resuspended.
Fractionated on sucrose gradient (0.65 M freeze-thaw gradient) and concentrated for grid preparation.
Loaded on anion exchange (Q sepharose) and eluted with 200 mM NaCl, pooled, concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200).  Fractions with A880/A280>1.55 were pooled for grid preparation.

name: photosystem II - light harvesting complex II

sample_preparation.purification_details: Fractionated on sucrose gradient (0.65 M freeze-thaw gradient) and concentrated for grid preparation.

name: photosystem I - light harvesting complexes I & II

sample_preparation.purification_details: Fractionated on sucrose gradient (0.6 M-1.0 M) and concentrated for grid preparation.

Incubated with 1D4 affinity resin for 3 h, 4 C before washing with 5 CV buffer containing 0.03% DDM, 0.006 % CHS.  Protein was eluted by incubation with 500 mg/L 1D4 peptide for 1.5 h, 4 C on a rotating wheel.  Eluent was then concentrated to 4 mg/mL and incubated with MSP1E3D1 and lipids (3:1 E coli PL:egg PC) for 30 min on ice in a 300 uL volume with a molar ratio of 0.33:1.5:120 protein:MSP:lipids in presence of 3.5x molar excess of sodium cholate (15 mM).  75 mg SM2 beads were then added and sample was incubated for 1 h, 4 C on rotating wheel.  A second aliquot of 75 mg SM2 beads were then added and samle was incubated a further 16 h.  Proteo-nanodiscs were than collected by ultracentrifugation and concentrated to 110 uL and loaded onto SEC (G400SWXL).  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

For detergent extraction, IMAC column was washed with 10 CV's of 0.05% b-DDM to exchange with the triton for immobilized protein.  After this, protein was eluted and run on a final SEC (S200).  For SMALP extraction, 3000HNA or Xiran 25010 was added dropwise to stirred membranes to concentration of 1%.  this incubated for 1 h at RT before IMAC.
Protein eluted from anion exchange column (Q sepharose) at 350 mM NaCl, fractions pooled and concentrated before loading on SECD (S6).  Peak pooled and concetrated for grid preparation
Protein eluted from anion exchange column (Q sepharose) at 350 mM NaCl, fractions pooled and concentrated before loading on SECD (S6).  Peak pooled and concetrated for grid preparation

grid_preparation.comments: Grids were soaked in 5 mM 11-mercapotoundecyl hexaethyleneglycol in a glovebox for >24 h, rinsed in ethanol and air dried befofore use.

sample_preparation.purification_details: Loaded and washed on Q sepharose with 0.2% DDM, 0.02% asolectin, 0.02% CHAPS, washed with 275 mM NaCl and eluted with 360 mM NaCl.  this was then pooled and concentrated before loading on SEC (S6) where a detergent exchange to Cymal 7 was performed.

grid_preparation.comments: Incubated with 50 m 11-mercaptoundecyl hexaethyleneglycol for 2 days anaerobically then washed and dried before use

sample_preparation.purification_details: Washed on HiTrap Q HP column with 200 mM NaCl before elution at 350 mM NaCl.  Fractions pooled, concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Maximal fraction was used for structural determination.

Washed on Q sepharose and washed with 0.1% LMNG, eluted in a NaCl gradient.  Fractions pooled, concentrated and loade don SEC (S6) where detergent exchange to Brij-35 occured.  Peak fractions pooled and concentrated

Loaded on anion exchange column (Q sepharose HP) and eluted at 350 mM NaCl over a gradient (0-500 mM).  Peak was then bound to a Ni-sepharose column and eluted with a 125 mM linear gradient.  Peak then re-applied to anion exchange and eluted with the same linear gradient as before.  Peak was then loaded on SEC (S200), pooled, concentrated and frozen until grid preparation.

sample_preparation.extraction_parameters: DOPC:DOPE liposomes were made through Folch extraction, drying, rehydration and filtering through 100 nm membrane.  Compliment proteins were incubated with liposomes for 1 h at 37 C followed by ON at 4 C.
sample_preparation.purification_details: Complexes assembled in liposomes and then extracted with 1.5% Cymal-5, 1 mg/mL DOPC for 1 h, RT.  Solubilized complexes were isolated using a sucrose gradient with Cymal-7.  Sucrose was removed using a ZebaSpin desalting column.

TcA loaded on Ni-NTA, washed with 10 CV containing 0.05% Tween-20, 50 mM imidazole and eluted with 250 mM imidazole.  Dialized and loaded on SEC (S6) with peak concentrated for reconstitution.  Reconstitution performed by incubating MSP1D1 and POPC for 30 min, 4 C in 1% sodium cholate.  TcA then added in a 1:8:440 ratio, incubated for 1 h and dialyzed against pH 11 buffer ON, 4 C.  SEC performed (S6) and peak used for grid preparation.

Rinsed with 0.06% digitonin while imobilized on anti-FLAG, eluted with flag peptide (200 ug/mL) then loaded on IMAC.  Rinsed with 20 mM and eluted with 250 mM imidazole.  then concentrated and run on SEC (S6)

Rinsed with 0.06% digitonin while imobilized on anti-FLAG, eluted with flag peptide (200 ug/mL) then loaded on IMAC.  Rinsed with 20 mM and eluted with 250 mM imidazole.  then concentrated and run on SEC (S6)

Imobilized protein washed with 10 CV  of 0.01 LMNG, 0.001 CHS then 10 CV of 0.05 digitonin and eluted with biotin.  Incubated ON at 4C with 3C, desalted (PD-10 column) and run through StrepTactin again to remove uncleaved protein.Concentrated and run on SEC (S6)

grid_preparation.comments: Incubated with agonists/antagonists for 10 min at RT before application to grids

sample_preparation.purification_details: Eluted with maltose, then incubated with amphipol ON at 4 C with gentle agitation.  Bio-Beads added for 1 H at 4 C, removed by empty gravity column before final SEC.

Incubated with Talon resin, eluted with 250 mM imidazole onto StrepTactin resin before elution with 5 mM biotin.  This was then concentrated and mixed with substrate (Fab 11D1, 1:1.2 molar ratio) before application to SEC equilibrated with DDM and CHS.  Peaks were pooled and concentrated.

grid_preparation.comments: Sample was mixed with substrates (D-APV, DCKA, glutamate, glycine, Ro25-6981) at final concentration of 1 mM just before application to grid

sample_preparation.affinity_tag_terminus: EGFP, His-8 (C, GluN1), EGFP, StrepII (C, GluN2B)
sample_preparation.purification_details: Eluted with biotin, concentrated and incubated with 3C and endoglycosidease H (? h, ? C).  Treated with 500 uM copper phenanthroline to enhance crosslinking, run on SEC (? column) where it was exchanged to 1 mM b-DDM, 0.2 mM CHS.

Loaded on StrepTactin column, washed with buffer containing 1 mM DDM, 0.2 mM CHS and eluted with biotin.  This was then mixed with Fab in a 3:1 w/w ratio and injected on SEC (S6).  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.
StrepTactin elution followed by mixing with Fab (1:2 w:w ratio) before running on SEC (S200)
Eluted with FLAG peptide, no SEC performed, screening done with negative stain

grid_preparation.comments: Smaple incubated with substrate (10 mM glycine&5 uM ivermectin, 1 mM strychnine, or 10 mM glycine) for a few hours before application to grid

sample_preparation.purification_details: Incubated with Talon resin ON, wahsed with 35 mM imidazole and eluted with 250 mM.  Then concentrated and digested by thrombin (1:100 w:w) ON at 4 C.  Digestion applied to SEC (?) and peak was pooled and concentrated.

Incubated with 2 mM calcium and 4 mL M1 anti-FLAG resin for 90 min, 4 C (stirred).  Washed in batch with 0.1% DDM, 0.01% CHS, transfered to column and washed with same buffer followed by a detergent excheange in which, over 30 min, a stepwise exchange from 0.1% DDM, 0.01% CHS was changed to 0.2% GDN, 0.02% CHS.  After this, the concentration of GDN was lowered to 0.02% followed by addition of ligand (5 uM CDPPB) and finally elution with 0.2 mg/mL Flag peptide.  Fractions were pooled, concentrated and mixed with a nanobody (Nb43) before injection on SEC (S6).  Nanobody bound fractions were pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.,

Incubated with 2 mM calcium and 4 mL M1 anti-FLAG resin for 90 min, 4 C (stirred).  Washed in batch with 0.1% DDM, 0.01% CHS, transfered to column and washed with same buffer followed by  elution with 0.2 mg/mL Flag peptide.  Fractions were pooled, concentrated and mixed with a nanobody (Nb43) before injection on SEC (S6).  Nanobody bound fractions were pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.,
as previously described....strep tactin column, eluted with biotin, digested with thrombin at 18 C ON, purified by SEC (S6)

incubated for 90 min at 4 C with talon beads in 10 mM imidazole before 40 mM wash and 250 mM elution.  Eluent was then incubated overnight at 4 C with thrombin (1:100 w/w ratio).  This was then run on SEC (S6).

grid_preparation.comments: Sample was incubated with substrates and states trapped before vitrification

sample_preparation.purification_details: incubated for 90 min at 4 C with talon beads in 10 mM imidazole before 40 mM wash and 250 mM elution.  Eluent was then incubated overnight at 4 C with thrombin (1:100 w/w ratio).  This was then run on SEC (S6).

Loaded on column with 50 mM imidazole, eluted with 300 mM.  Eluent was concentrated and desalted (PD-10 column) before incubation on ice ON with 2.5 mg TEV.  TEV removed using NTA resin and sample was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200).  Peak was pooled and concentrated.

in_complex_with: mini-Gs, beta-1, gamma-2, nanobody Nb35, thioredoxin fusion

sample_preparation.purification_details: Loaded on Ni-Sepharose FF column, washed with 40 mM imidazole and eluted with 500 mM.  Eluent was dialysed ON with TEV to cut tag and remove imidazole.  TEV removed by negative purification on Ni-NTA before being concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200). Peak was pooled and concentrated.

in_complex_with: Gi2, beta-1, gamma-2, nanobody Nb35, thioredoxin fusion

sample_preparation.purification_details: Complex was formed by incubation with protein, Gi, ADO and apyrase for 2 h at 4 C.  This was then centrifuged (30 min, 30k rcf) and batch bound to M1 anti-Flag resin.  this was washed with 20 CV (0.01% LMNG, 0.001% CHS) before elution with Flag peptide (0.1 mg/mL).  Eluent was concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200).  Peak was pooled and concentrated.

in_complex_with: Gs, beta-1, gamma-2, nanobody Nb35, RAMP1

grid_preparation.comments: coated with carbon, glow discharged, added 1mg/mL PEI (max Mw-40 kDa) for 2 min, remocved and washed with water (2x) and dried for 15 min at RT

sample_preparation.purification_details: Eluted with ID4 peptide, concentrated and run on SEC containing 1.5 mM GABA
Eluted with 1D4 peptide then concentrated and deglycosylated with PNGase F (2 h, RT).  Digestion run on SEC (S6) and concentrated.

Concentrated to 0.5 mL and applied to linear sucrose gradient (10-45%), spun at 130k rcf for 21 h. Fractions were run on BN-PAGE using a linear gradient (4-20% polyacrylamide to deterimine which had respirasomes.  Respirasome fractions then desalted (PD-10).  Centrifuged and concentrated for grid preperation.

Concentrated to 1 mL and loaded on a sucrose gradient (0.6-1.8 M) and centrifuged for 20 h at 150k rcf, 4 C.  Gradients fractionated and run on BN-PAGE (3-10% polyacrylamide).  Identified fractions were concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Peaks pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

Concentrated to 1 mL and loaded on a sucrose gradient (0.3-1.8 M) and centrifuged for 20 h at 150k rcf, 4 C.  Gradients fractionated and run on BN-PAGE (3-10% polyacrylamide).  Identified fractions were concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  Peaks pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

grid_preparation.comments: 2 nm carbon layer added, 0.01% Tween-20 added for ice improvement

sample_preparation.purification_details: Lysed in DM, purified by Ni-NTA with 10 mM imidazole wash and elution with a linear gradient to 300 mM.  Protein then dialyzed to remove imidazole.  Nanodiscs were made by incubating empty, preformed nanodiscs (MSP1D1-deltaH5 and POPC) with the protein at a molar ratio of 1:4 protein:nanodiscs.  This was then dialysed for 96 h at RT with a buffer exchange at 24 h.  SEC was then performed to separate proteo-nanodiscs.
Protein was washed with 30 mM imidazole and eluted with 250 mM.  Eluent was pooled and concentrated before injection on SEC (S6).  Peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation.

Eluted with Biotin, run on an S200 then incubated with yeast polar lipids (0.1 mg/mL) and amphipol with gentle agitation for 30 min.  Diluted below CMC of DDM (1.8 mM) and then concentrated before SEC

Loaded on Ni-NTA and washed with 4 CV before elution with a gradient of 20-500 mM imidazole over 14 CV.  Eluent was then incubated with TEV (1:20) passed through Ni-NTA before concentration (20 mg/mL) and being run on SEC (S200) equilibrated with 0.2% DM.  Peak was used unconcentrated for 2D crystallization.  2D crystallization was performed by solubilizing a 2.5 mg/mL lipid stock (18:1 DOPG) in DDM (2:1 mass ratio) and mixing with protein (1:1 YiiP:lipid).  Solution waw dialysed for up to 2 weeks against detergent free buffer (changed daily) to create helical crystals.

grid_preparation.comments: Both DDM and nanodisc samples were used

sample_preparation.purification_details: Loaded and washed on Talon beads with 20 mM imidazole, eluted in 250 mM.  Protein was then loaded on SEC (S200).  Sample was either used directly for grids or reconstitued into nanodiscs as follows.  Protein was was incubated with MSP1D1 and lipid detergent micelles (POPC:POPG:DDM 8:2:35 molar ratio) at ratio of protein:MSP:lipid 5:10:550 molar.  Detergent was then removed with ON incubation at 4 C with biobeads.  Proteonanodiscs were purified by SEC (S200).
IMAC then SEC (S6) then concentrated to 0.1 mg/mL and incubated with amphipol for 3 h at 4 C.  Then 10:1 beads to detergent (w:w) incubated ON at 4C with rotation. before concentration

3 times through anti-Flag resin, rinsed with 0.06% digitonin and then eluted with FLAG peptide.  this was then loaded on Strep-Tactin, incubated for 1 h, 4 C and eluted with biotin.  Eluent concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6)
Eluted with desthiobiotin, incubated with amphipol ON at 4C. detergent removedwith beads for 1 h at 4C before final SEC.
Washed with 10 mM imidazole, eluted with 250 mM.  incubated with 3C for 3 h at 4 C then concentrated.  Exchanged in SEC (S6) with 0.1% digitonin
Washed with 10 mM imidazole, eluted with 250 mM.  incubated with 3C for 3 h at 4 C then concentrated.  Exchanged in SEC (S6) with 0.1% digitonin
Exchanged on column to GDN then eluted by 100 ug/mL resin protease incubated ON at 4C.  Eluent then concentrated and run on SEC (S6)
Exchanged on column to GDN then eluted by 100 ug/mL resin protease incubated ON at 4C.  Eluent then concentrated and run on SEC (S6)
Immobilized on CNBr-activated sepharose coupled to antibody for 19 C-terminus residues.  Eluted with 19 C-terminal residue peptide, then concentrated for use in grid preparation.

3-4 mg GST-FKBP12 was added during solubilization.  Complex loaded on GST affinity column (GS4B), washed with buffer containing 0.1% digitonin before elution with 10 mM GSH.  Peak was pooled, concentrated and loaded on SEC (S6).  SEC peak was pooled and concentrated for grid preparation
Protease was incubated with the column ON with gentle rotation before elution and final SEC (S6)

Loaded on column with bound GST-calstabin1, washed with 10 CV of buffer (0.5% CHAPS) and eluted with 2 CV of 10 uM calstabin2 (higher affinity for RyR1).  Eluent cleared with 0.5 mL glutathione beads, treatede with alkaline phosphatase (3 h, RT), concentrated and loaded on SEC (G4SWXL) containing 0.25% CHAPS, 0.001% DOPC.  Peak was pooled, incubated with substrates (Ca, ATP, Caffiene 10 min, RT; ryanodine 2 hr, RT followed by ON, 4 C), and finally concentrated for grid preparation.

Excess GST-FKBP12 was added during solubilization and bound protein was incubated with GST affinity resin (GS4B) for 2 h, 4 C. Protein washed with buffer containing 0.015% Tween-20 and eluted with 12 mM glutathione and further purified on ion exchange (Mono S).  Peak pooled, concentrated and loaded on SEC (S200).  Fractipons containing complex were pooled for grid preperation.
